value.title: StarCraft 2: The World Championship GRAND FINALS! (Best-of-7)

value.excerpt: Crazy game of professional StarCraft 2 between Nice (Protoss) and Spirit (Terran). Nice decides to play a Protoss build that reminds me of the way that Zerg players play. value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC Games on Moondance - The BEST New Map?
value.excerpt: In this video I casted two professional games of StarCraft 2 on Moondance. Moondance is a map with a lot of bases but a short rush distance.
